name: E-prime preprocessing
description: This tutorial outlines the preprocessing for the PANAS, SART, goal practice task and writing tasks
The files for these are under 'eprime' on sharepoint

name: PANAS
description: This document is currently laid out to allow a direct copy and paste from the e.dat files
Need to add in labelling to know which question is which
Open the e.dat file and copy over the PANAS column for each time point
Once this is complete you will be able to 'copy' and 'transpose' to get this laid out with participant as rows and the data as columns

name: Writing Tasks
description: Open the excel file called 'Writing tasks'
Like the PANAS this is a direct copy and paste from the e.dat files.
Use 'find' and 'replace' to remove all the extra characters

name: SART
description: For the SART you will need to export the files into excel
Export as a text file which you can then open in excel
Open the text file and then save as excel macro enabled workbook
You can automate this process using the 'SARTConvertFileType' macro
Now you can run another macro to clean up this spreadsheet and output the thought probes, accuracy and reaction time data
